ygData.subject: Re: Research different for each class?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a friend dwarf who has found some strange pages on recently killed orc centurions and oracles.  He sold them for somewheres around 6PP per page (he had
ygData.messageBody:
I have a friend dwarf who has found some strange pages on recently killed
orc centurions and oracles. He sold them for somewheres around 6PP per
page (he had 2 of them)

These could be the pages and he found them on orcs at a camp in the
butcherblock mountains.

<snip>
>> where do you find these lost pages?
<snip>
>> > for necros, it's based on words ( like Word of divination ) that you
>need
>> to
>> > combine and for Enchanters, it seems to be based on pages of Lost Books
>> that
>> > need to be restored.
>> >
